org.edg.data.replication.optorsim

Interface Users

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    CMSDC04Users, RandomWaitUsers, SimpleUsers

    public interface Users
extends java.lang.Runnable
    The Users interface represents the human users of the Grid who submit jobs to it. The run() method loops for the number of jobs to run, calling getNextJob(), ResourceBroker.submitJob(GridJob) then waitForNextJob() for each job. Users implementations should define how long to wait between submitting jobs using waitForNextJob() and what the next job to submit will be using getNextJob().

    Copyright (c) 2004 CERN, ITC-irst, PPARC, on behalf of the EU DataGrid. For license conditions see LICENSE file or http://www.edg.org/license.html

    Since:
    JDK1.4

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      GridJob getNextJob()
      Returns the next GridJob that is to be submitted to the RB.
      void pauseUsers()
      Stop the users from submitting jobs.
      void unPauseUsers()
      Start the users submitting jobs again.
      void waitForNextJob()
      Called after submitting a job to create a delay between jobs.
